label: I-26 Photo 0049
description: Marine Center (boat sales) on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Address 4752 Rivers Avenue. View of street corner. C & R Motors in background. Possibly on Rivers Avenue. Surveyor notations on back of photo: "Dkt.: 10.486. Property owner: C.W. Keller. Tract: 33. Station: 2+75 Lt. (Line E). Date: May 30, 1961. Sign to be moved." [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
